original_text: Come to me all of you who are tired. You are like people who have worked for a long time. You are like people who have carried heavy things. Come to me. If you do that, you will find a place to rest.
korean_text: 수고하고 무거운 짐 진 자들아 다 내게로 오라 내가 너희를 쉬게 하리라

sentences.original_text: all of you who are tired
You are like people who have worked for a long time
You are like people who have carried heavy things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 무거운 것들을 메고 가는 사람들과 같구나

sentences.original_text: you will find a place to rest
